titles.title: Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" / Täʾamrä Mikaʾel "Miracles of Michael" / Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus "Miracles of Jesus"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 2ra-116rb) I-1a) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 6 miracles (fols. 2ra-8va) I-2) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymns (fols. 10ra-13vb) I-3) Introductory exhortation (fols. 13vb-15rb) I-4) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... "I worship Thee..." (fol. 15ra-vb) I-1b) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 110 miracles (fols. 16ra-116rb) I-5) ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi ... "Does not the man ..." (distributed among the miracles of Mary, fols. 17va-44ra) II) Täʾamrä Mikaʾel "Miracles of Michael": 2 miracles (fols. 116rb-117va) III) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus "Miracles of Jesus": 2 miracles (fols. 117va-119rb)
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: The hand that wrote Text I-a (hand a) is probably the same as Wäldä Wäldä Śǝllase (?) of BGY-013. Gäbrä Maryam (hand b) is mentioned as the scribe in the colophon.

donors.donor:
According to Additio 1, the Ms. was donated to the church by fitawrari Ḫaylu and wäyzäro Ṭǝru.
The following persons are mentioned in supplication formulas of Text I-1a (hand a): Ḫaylä Maryam, Wälättä ʾƎwosṭatewos, Wälättä Mǝḥrät. These names together with the name of Wälättä Mäsqäl were inserted into supplication formulas throughout all other texts, in a secondary hand (probably the same as Additio) in rose ink.

dcomments.dcomment: Mid 19th – first half of the 20th cent. (?)

txstates.txstate: Fols. 10-15 (Texts I-2, I-3 and I-4) and fols. 116-119 (Texts II and III) show traces of extensive use. Quires I and II (hand a) have possibly been added later. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 1, 12, 14, 34, 46, 47, 54, 59, 60, 66, 67, 68, 72, 74, 75, 77, 84, 89, 90, 94, 105, 118, 119, 120.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 7 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, small x, corni form, x-form, double crescent, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover. Quire B is reinforced with a parchment guard.

inks.ink: Black, red (brown: fols. 2r-8v, vivid scarlet: fols. 10r-15v; strong red: 16r-74v, 89r-90v; vermillion/brown: fols. 76r-89r, 91r

squires.squire: <I(7; sl.: 2, stub after 6/fols. 1r-7v) – II(2/fols. 8r-9v)> – III(6/fols. 10r-15v) – ፩IV(8/fols. 16r-23v) – ፪V(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 24r-31v) – ፫VI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 32r-39v) – ፬VII(8/fols. 40r-47v) – ፭VIII(8/fols. 48r-55v) – ፮IX(8/fols. 56r-63v) – ፯X(8/fols. 64r-71v) – ፰XI(8/fols. 72r-79v) – ፱XII(8/fols. 80r-87v) – ፲XIII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 88r-95v) – ፲፩XIV(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 96r-103v) – ፲፪XV(8/fols. 104r-111v) – XVI(8/fols. 112r-119v) – XVI(2/fols. 120r-121v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Mid 19th – first half of the 20th century (?)

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: Rather fine. Hand b: Mediocre, but careful.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: Quires I and II (fols. 2r-9v). The handwriting appears a bit uneven with narrow formed, irregularly slanted and broadly spaced letters; some letters have forked hook vowel markers (esp. ን, ጋ). The handwriting is very similar (possibly identical) to that of Ms. BQM-009. Hand b, Gäbrä Maryam: Quires III-XVI (fols. 10ra-119rb); wide, broadly spaced, rounded and upright letters.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist in Text II; names of other characters like Gäbrǝʾel (fols. 5ra, 45va, 46ra), Yoḥannǝs (fols. 5ra, 12va), Mikaʾel (fols. 13va, 44rb, 45va, 46ra); elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1b, I-2, I-4 (alternating with black lines); several groups of lines in the incipit of Text I-3 (alternating with black lines); two initial lines of Texts I-1a and its sections; two initial lines of sections of Texts I-1b, II and III und their section numbers; first one or two words of sections of Text I-2 and of each strophe of Text I-5.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓ፡ ዓለም፡ አ፡ ን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 25rb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 35va, 46ra, 50rb, 111ra) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 46va, 51ra)

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-2 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fol. 13ra) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam dǝngǝl ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fol. 13ra-vb).
The miracles of Texts I-1b, II and III are numbered (the numeration continues throughout these texts).
One miracle of Text I-1b (numbered as 28) is followed by a hymn: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam dǝngǝl wälättä ʾAron liqä kahǝnät... "O my Lady, Virgin Mary, daughter of Aaron the High Priest…" (fol. 42va)
Text I-5 comprises 19 strophes which are strophes 1-10 (fols. 17va-24va), 12-14 (fols. 29va-31rb), 24-27 (fol. 36rb-40rb) and 29-30 (42va, 44ra) according to GrohHymn pp. 336-51.

colophon.det: The colophon mentiones the name of the scribe Gäbrä Maryam. The writing was completed on 24 Ṭǝqǝmt, in the third hour, on Wednesday.

additional.tran: Fol. 119rb: This book is of fitawrari Ḫaylu [and] of wäyzäro Ṭǝru who donated it to the tabot of John the Bapitist of Gwälˁa ˀAgame, that it might be for them a guide to the Kingdom of Heaven.
additional.det: The note is written in rose ink, partly faded and followed by two stamps of the church.

extras.extra: - The internal number of the ecclesiastic library has been written on fol. 1r: 5 No 7. 24-8-93 (?) - Stamp of the church on fols. 1r, 3r, 38r, 55r, 119r. - Omissions inserted interlineally: fols. 10vab, 14ra, 19rb, 24ra, 27vb, 31rb, 49va, 60va, 59rb, 97ra, 109rb, 114ra. - Immediate correction indicated by dots around the letter to be cancelled on fol. 16vb. - Erroneously written words crossed out: fols. 68ra, 73ra. - Spaces for names of individuals to be rubricated are left unfilled on fol. 31rb.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks are written in the centre of the upper margin: fols. 16r: ፩, 24r: ፪, 32r: ፫, 40r: ፬, 48r: ፭, 56r: ፮, 64: ፯, 72r: ፰, 80r: ፱, 88r: ፲, 96r: ፲፩, 104r: ፲፪.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts and other occasions written in the upper margin, in different hands: ዘበዓለ፡ ፍልሰታ፡ አመ፲ወ፮፡ ለነሐሴ: fol. 2ra ዘጽዮን፡ አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለኅዳር: fol. 5v ደቅስዮስ: fol. 16rb ጥምቀት: fol. 33rb አመ፡ ፮ቍስቋም: fol. 34va ዘበላኤ፡ ነፍሳት: fol. 40rb ዘስቅለት: fol. 47r በአታ፡ ማርያም: fol. 51ra ዘልደት: fol. 52rb ዘፅንሰታ: fol. 53va ዘግንቦት፡ ልደታ: fol. 55r ዘእሁድ: fol. 64vb ዘሰኔ: fol. 67rb ዘጥር፡ እረፍታ: fol. 73rb ዘግንቦት: fol. 76rb ዘደብረ፡ ምጥማቅ: fol. 98ra ዘጥር: fol. 99ra.
